bridge-type.label: Ring Account Bridge
bridge-type.description: Account with ring.com to access the devices

parameter.name: username
parameter.label: User Name
parameter.description: Enter the user name you used to subscribe to the Ring services. If using 2 factor authentication, leave this blank and enter the refresh token instead.

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Account's Password
parameter.description: Enter the password you used to subscribe to the Ring services. If using 2 factor authentication, leave this blank and enter the refresh token instead.

parameter.name: twofactorCode
parameter.label: 2 factor authentication code
parameter.description: Enter the 2 factor authentication code, if enabled

parameter.name: hardwareId
parameter.label: A unique hardware id
parameter.description: Enter a hardware id that is unique for all your devices connected to Ring (e.g. computer's MAC address)

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh interval
parameter.description: How often to poll the Ring service for events in seconds

parameter.name: videoStoragePath
parameter.label: Video Download Path
parameter.description: The folder path to save video .mp4 files in when downloaded from ring.com. Note: the openhab user must have rights to save to this location

parameter.name: videoRetentionCount
parameter.label: Number of videos to keep
parameter.description: The number of video files to keep when automatically downloading the latest event video, or 0 to disable auto downloading

parameter.name: offOffset
parameter.label: Power-off Time
parameter.description: Offset in minutes to switch off

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: How often to poll the Ring service for events in seconds
